description: This Python module defines a `TranslatorService` class that handles translation and mapping between TMF (telecommunications management forum) formatted data and native Django application data formats. It provides functions for renaming fields, normalizing IDs, and translating payloads and query parameters between formats, including resource-specific mappings and post-processing hooks.

classes.name: TranslatorService
classes.description: A service class that manages translation between TMF and native data formats, supporting resource-specific mappings, query param translation, and post-processing.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] _rename_fields(data: Dict[str, Any], mapping: Dict[str, str], passthrough: bool = True)
methods.description: Utility function to rename keys in a dictionary based on a provided mapping; can pass through unknown keys.

methods.name: Any _normalize_id(value: Any)
methods.description: Normalizes an ID value to a string, handling None values.

methods.name: __init__(self, schema_loader)
methods.description: Constructor initializing the schema loader and resource mapping registry.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] _apply_query_mapping(self, resource: str, params: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Translates query parameters for a given resource according to the registry.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] _item_tmf_post(self, data: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Post-processing hook for TMF payloads, ensures ID normalization.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] _item_native_post(self, data: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Post-processing hook for native payloads, ensures ID normalization.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] tmf_to_native(self, resource: str, payload: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Converts TMF payloads to native format using resource-specific mappings and post-processing.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] translate_query_params(self, resource: str, params: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Translates TMF query parameters to native format.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] native_to_tmf(self, resource: str, payload: Any)
methods.description: Converts native responses to TMF format, handling dicts, lists, and other payloads with optional post-processing.

ctags.name: _apply_query_mapping
ctags.pattern: /^    def _apply_query_mapping(self, resource: str, params: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/

ctags.name: _item_native_post
ctags.pattern: /^    def _item_native_post(self, data: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/

ctags.name: _item_tmf_post
ctags.pattern: /^    def _item_tmf_post(self, data: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/

ctags.name: _rename_fields
ctags.pattern: /^def _rename_fields(data: Dict[str, Any], mapping: Dict[str, str], passthrough: bool = True) -> D/
ctags.signature: (data: Dict[str, Any], mapping: Dict[str, str], passthrough: bool = True)

ctags.name: map_one
ctags.pattern: /^        def map_one(obj: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/

ctags.name: native_to_tmf
ctags.pattern: /^    def native_to_tmf(self, resource: str, payload: Any) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/

ctags.name: tmf_to_native
ctags.pattern: /^    def tmf_to_native(self, resource: str, payload: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/

ctags.pattern: /^    def translate_query_params(self, resource: str, params: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/
